feed.title: BBBike@World - a Cycle Route Planner
feed.subtitle: BBBike is a route planner for cyclists in Berlin. It is now ported to other cities around the world - thanks to the OpenStreetMap project!

entry.title: New Garmin style Openfietsmap Full
entry.content: The BBBike extract service supports Garmin Openfietsmap Full style

entry.title: New: cycle routing for Minsk
entry.content: New: cycle routing for Minsk: https://www.bbbike.org/Minsk/

entry.title: New OSM export format MBTiles
entry.content: The BBBike extract service supports MBTiles format

entry.title: The BBBike Map Compare service supports now historic maps of Berlin
entry.content: 1698-1871 1874-1900 1903-1913 1914-1928

entry.title: New OSM export format SQLite
entry.content: The BBBike extract service supports SQLite format

entry.title: New OSM export format GeoJSON
entry.content: The BBBike extract service supports GeoJSON format

entry.title: Perl/Tk extracts for the BBBike App
entry.content: The BBBike extract service supports the Perl/Tk App

entry.title: New: cycle routing for Porto
entry.content: New: cycle routing for Porto: https://www.bbbike.org/Porto/

entry.title: New Garmin style OpenTopoMap
entry.content: The BBBike extract service supports Garmin OpenTopoMap style

entry.title: New Garmin style OpenSeaMap
entry.content: The BBBike extract service supports Garmin OpenSeaMap style

entry.title: More us-ascii Garmin styles
entry.content: The BBBike extract service supports more Garmin styles in us-ascii for devices without unicode support, or broken DRM

entry.title: New us-ascii Garmin styles
entry.content: The BBBike extract service supports Garmin styles in us-ascii for devices without unicode support, or broken DRM

entry.title: New Garmin style Openfietsmap Lite
entry.content: The BBBike extract service supports Garmin Openfietsmap Lite style

entry.title: New Garmin style "Onroad" for older devices with less space - usually 1/10 the size of Garmin OSM
entry.content: The BBBike extract service supports Garmin Onroad style for older devices with less space

entry.title: The extract service supports now MAPSE.ME format for Android and iOS
entry.content: The BBBike extract service supports now MAPSE.ME format for Android and iOS

entry.title: Map Compare now supports up to 140 maps: https://mc.bbbike.org/mc/
entry.content: Map Compare now supports up to 140 maps: bbbike.org/mc

entry.title: The extract service supports now SVG format and PNG images
entry.content: The BBBike extract service supports now SVG format and PNG images

entry.title: The extract service is now 5 times faster. It takes between 2-7 minutes to extract an area from planet.osm
entry.content: The extract service is now 5 times faster. It takes between 2-7 minutes to extract an area from planet.osm

entry.title: Map Compare now supports up to 108 maps: https://mc.bbbike.org/mc/
entry.content: Map Compare now supports up to 108 maps: bbbike.org/mc

entry.title: BBBike Windows Phone app
entry.content: A free BBBike Windows Phone app is availble in the Windows Phone store. The city Berlin use the original BBBike data, the other cities are OSM based.

entry.title: BBBike cycle route searches are now 2-3 times faster
entry.content: BBBike cycle route searches are now 2-3 times faster

entry.title: The BBBike extract service supports now libosmium OPL format
entry.content: The BBBike extract service supports now libosmium OPL format

entry.title: The BBBike extract service supports now Contours (SRTM) extracts for PBF, Garmin, and Osmand
entry.content: The BBBike extract service supports now SRTM extracts for PBF, Garmin, and Osmand

entry.title: The BBBike extract service supports now CSV format
entry.content: The BBBike extract service supports now CSV format

entry.title: GPSies blog article (German): Easy way to generate maps for Garmin GPS and Android Locus app http://blog.gpsies.com/article/187/karten-aus-openstreetmap-fuer-garmin-outdoor-gps-erstellen
entry.content: GPSies blog article (German): Easy way to generate maps for Garmin GPS and Android Locus app http://blog.gpsies.com/article/187/karten-aus-openstreetmap-fuer-garmin-outdoor-gps-erstellen

entry.title: The new iPhone app for BBBike is available. It's free, try it out!
entry.content: The new iPhone app for BBBike is available. It's free, try it out!

entry.content: BBBike extract service now in Russian.

entry.content: BBBike extract service now in French.

entry.content: BBBike extract service now in Spanish.

entry.title: Den BBBike extract service gibt es jetzt auch auf deutsch.
entry.content: Den BBBike extract service gibt es jetzt auch auf deutsch.

entry.title: The BBBike extract service supports now mapsforge format
entry.content: The BBBike extract service supports now mapsforge format for Android devices

entry.title: Added new cities
entry.content: New city: La Plata

entry.title: The BBBike extract service supports now .o5m format
entry.content: The BBBike extract service supports now .o5m format

entry.title: The BBBike extract service supports now polygons
entry.content: The BBBike extract service supports now polygons

entry.title: The BBBike extract service supports now the Navit format
entry.content: The BBBike extract service supports now the Navit format

entry.title: A new BBBike iPhone app is availble in the iTune store.
entry.content: A new BBBike iPhone app is availble in the iTune store. The city Berlin use the original BBBike data, the other cities are OSM based.

entry.title: Map Compare with new maps: Nokia Map, Terrain, Satellite, Hybrid, Public Transit, Traffic. Map Compare now supports up to 52 maps: https://mc.bbbike.org/mc/
entry.content: Map Compare with new maps: Nokia Map, Terrain, Satellite, Hybrid, Public Transit, Traffic. Map Compare now supports up to 52 maps: https://mc.bbbike.org/mc/

entry.title: New feature: BBBike extract service with Osmand map format #osm #android
entry.content: New feature: BBBike extract service with Osmand map format #osm #android

entry.title: New feature: Map Compare supports up to 32 maps on the screen and a fullscreen mode: https://mc.bbbike.org/mc/
entry.content: Map Compare supports up to 32 maps on the screen and a fullscreen mode: https://mc.bbbike.org/mc/

entry.title: New feature: BBBike extract service with shapefile map format #osm #esri #gis
entry.content: New feature: BBBike extract service with OSM Shape map format

entry.title: A new BBBike Android app (Berlin only, original data) is available in the android market: https://play.google.com/store/search?q=bbbike
entry.content: A new BBBike Android app (Berlin only, original data) is available in the android market: https://play.google.com/store/search?q=bbbike

entry.title: New feature: BBBike extract service with Garmin OSM and Garmin cycle map format
entry.content: New feature: BBBike extract service with Garmin OSM and Garmin cycle map format

entry.content: New feature: start search a route with right click on the map

entry.content: New feature: move start or destination pointers from a street marker

entry.content: Improve HTML layout, use all available space for map

entry.content: Added new overlay map: Google Panoramio photos

entry.content: New extract service for OSM data, select your individual area up to 400km x 600km large, https://extract.bbbike.org

entry.content: New feature: new maps Esri and Esri Topo

entry.content: New feature: a smoothness layer for streets in Berlin (excellent, good, cobblestones, horrible)

entry.content: New: support search for addresses with house numbers and zip code

entry.title: google maps version 3
entry.content: Fully use google maps version 3 for all maps on https://bbbike.org which enable new features like elevation charts and better support for mobile devices.

entry.title: More translations to other languages
entry.content: BBBike.org is now available in Danish, German, English, Spanish, French, Croatian, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese and Russian

entry.title: New directory layout with shorter URLs
entry.content: BBBike.org has now a new directory layout with a sub-directory for each city, e.g. the new home page for London is https://www.bbbike.org/London

entry.title: Added new cities
entry.content: New cities: Bochum

entry.title: Added new cities
entry.content: New cities: Bern

entry.title: Added new cities
entry.content: New cities: Adelaide, Auckland, Brisbane, Buenos Aires, Canberra, Halifax, Johannesburg, Melbourne, Philadelphia

entry.title: Weather forecast
entry.content: Display weather forecast for the next 4 days in local language.

entry.title: Weather
entry.content: Display current weather conditions in local language.

entry.title: New cities for England
entry.content: New cities: Birmingham, Bristol, Leeds, Liverpool, Manchester, Sheffield

entry.title: New cities for Scotland
entry.content: New cities: Edinburgh, Glasgow

entry.title: Donatations
entry.content: We accecpt donations! ;-) https://bbbike.org/community.html

entry.title: Twitter
entry.content: BBBike is on https://twitter.com/BBBikeWorld!

entry.title: Google Maps v3
entry.content: BBBike supports now google maps version 3 which enable new features like localization and elevation charts.

entry.title: Additional map type terrain
entry.content: Additional map type terrain

entry.title: Redesign of BBBike
entry.content: Redesign of BBBike@world search page.

entry.title: Plotting Street Names
entry.content: The street names will be plotted as you type in Google Maps.

entry.content: Added new cities: Bamberg

entry.title: More cities supported
entry.content: Added new cities: Victoria

entry.title: Elevation chart
entry.content: BBBike@World displays the elevation chart for the route.

entry.title: More cities supported
entry.content: Added new cities: Nuernberg, Muenchen, Kiel, Oldenburg, Genf, Warschau, Magdeburg, Posen, Breslau, Kattowitz, and Gleiwitz.

entry.title: New design for BBBike\@world search
entry.content: New design for BBBike@world search

entry.title: New cities for BBBike\@world
entry.content: BBBike@World supports now 125 cities world wide.

entry.title: Updated BBBike\@Berlin packages for MacOS
entry.content: The BBBike@Berlin package for MacOS are updated.

entry.title: OpenSearch search plugins
entry.content: Added support for OpenSearch search plugins for all cities.

entry.title: Slippymap supports cycle map
entry.content: Added support for cycle map layer.
